file_content.text: The explosives have been placed, and the walker convoy destroyed.
Excuse me? Who is this? What happened to Bravo Team?
I am a Lord of the Sith and apprentice to Darth Baras.
I am the heir of Kallig and Tulak Hord, and master of the dead.
My lord, I didn't mean any disrespect. I was just surprised to hear from you and not Bravo Team.
I'm a cipher agent, but that's not common knowledge and it should stay that way.
I know how to be discreet.
I'm just a lucky gun looking to make a few credits.
I think that can be arranged.
Bravo Team died without completing their mission. I picked up where they left off.
Dead? Then we're fortunate you came along. I'm humbled and grateful.
Taking out that convoy saved our skins. We owe you more than thanks for taking on this job, but thank you.
